title: All For a Check
itunes:title: All For a Check
description:
Today on the show we had the battle of the listeners from our longtime listeners Trav and Nick G who both submitted a song for other listeners to determine who had the better verse. Also, after Mona Scott the producer/director of Love And Hip- Hop revealed she does not watch it in her household and possibly just does the show for a check, we opened up the phone lines to see what our listeners thought about it. Moreover, Charlamagne gave "Donkey of the Day" to two teen girls who killed an uber driver by trying to carjack his car, which turned into a topic about what their punishment should be.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
